search.query: `mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID="DGS*" | sort Date desc | fields + Date | head 1 | table Date

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Interest Rates") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) Value!="." | stats last(Value) as Value by _time SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Interest Rates") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) | sort Date desc | dedup SeriesID | table SeriesID Date | transpose 0 column_name=SeriesID header_field=SeriesID | fields - SeriesID
| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Interest Rates") | table FredID Name | transpose 0 column_name=FredID header_field=FredID | fields - FredID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Corporate Bonds" OR Category="Bond Market Indexes") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) Value!="." | stats last(Value) as Value by _time SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Corporate Bonds" OR Category="Bond Market Indexes") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) | sort Date desc | dedup SeriesID | table SeriesID Date | transpose 0 column_name=SeriesID header_field=SeriesID | fields - SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Exchange Rates" OR Category="Crypto*") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) Value!="." | stats last(Value) as Value by _time SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Exchange Rates" OR Category="Crypto*") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) | sort Date desc | dedup SeriesID | table SeriesID Date | transpose 0 column_name=SeriesID header_field=SeriesID | fields - SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Monetary Data") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) Value!="." | stats last(Value) as Value by _time SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Monetary Data") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) | sort Date desc | dedup SeriesID | table SeriesID Date | transpose 0 column_name=SeriesID header_field=SeriesID | fields - SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Commodities") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) Value!="." | stats last(Value) as Value by _time SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Commodities") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) | sort Date desc | dedup SeriesID | table SeriesID Date | transpose 0 column_name=SeriesID header_field=SeriesID | fields - SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Stock Market Indexes") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) Value!="." | stats last(Value) as Value by _time SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Stock Market Indexes") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) | sort Date desc | dedup SeriesID | table SeriesID Date | transpose 0 column_name=SeriesID header_field=SeriesID | fields - SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Stock Market Indexes") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) | sort Date desc | dedup SeriesID | table SeriesID Value | transpose 0 column_name=SeriesID header_field=SeriesID | head 1 | fields - SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Employment") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) Value!="." | stats last(Value) as Value by _time SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Employment") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) | sort Date desc | dedup SeriesID | table SeriesID Date | transpose 0 column_name=SeriesID header_field=SeriesID | fields - SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Consumer") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) Value!="." | stats last(Value) as Value by _time SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Consumer") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) | sort Date desc | dedup SeriesID | table SeriesID Date | transpose 0 column_name=SeriesID header_field=SeriesID | fields - SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Manufacturing") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) Value!="." | stats last(Value) as Value by _time SeriesID

`mts_econ_indexes` SeriesID IN ([| inputlookup FRED_Default_List where (Category="Housing") | fields FredID | mvcombine FredID | eval fid=mvjoin(FredID,",") | return $fid]) Value!="." | stats last(Value) as Value by _time SeriesID
